Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Marcin-22 (natural AMPs; scorpions, arachnids, Chelicerata, arthropods, invertebrates, animals; UCLL1a)

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that the sequence of the peptide shows 77.3% similarity toMeucin-18. molecular formula: C131H200N34O27; Mol Wt: 2696.233; GRAVY = -0.09. Helical in 50% TFE.Activity: Active against Gram+ and Gram- bacteria. Active against B. megaterium CGMCC 1.0459 (lethal concentration LC 1.35 uM), B. subtilis CGMCC 1.2428 (LC 2.11 uM), M. luteus CGMCC 1.0290 (LC 2.58 uM), methicillin-sensitive S. aureus CGMCC 1.89 (LC 1.35 uM), penicillin-sensitive S. epidermidi P1111 (LC 1.35 uM), methicillin-resistant coagulase-negative S. aureus p1369 (LC 1.35 uM), MRSA P1374 (LC 1.35 uM),  penicillin-resistant S. epidermidis P1389 (LC 3.72 uM), S. aureus J685 (LC 2.39 uM), S. aureus J698 (LC 2.39 uM), S. aureus J700 (LC 2.39 uM), S. sanguinis ATCC 1.2497 (LC 9.12 uM),  S. salivarius ATCC 1.2498 (LC 4.22 uM),  S. mutans ATCC 1.2499 (LC 4.22 uM),  and S. warneri ATCC 1.2824 (LC 4.45 uM).Structure: helical in 50% TFE
Literature Information.Author: Gao B, Zhu S.2018
Literature Information.Title: Mesobuthus Venom-Derived Antimicrobial Peptides Possess Intrinsic Multifunctionality and Differential Potential as Drugs.
